actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education.

official_title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require the use of succeeding fiscal year Pell Grant appropriations to meet prior fiscal year shortfalls.

summary.text: Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require the use of succeeding fiscal year appropriations to meet prior fiscal year shortfalls under the Pell Grant program.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require the use of succeeding fiscal year Pell Grant appropriations to meet prior fiscal year shortfalls.
